data.text: @dennisweb3 @lufthansa Hi there, I'm sorry that your flight was overbooked and that you missed your concert because of that. Did you already get the compensation payment? If not, please fill out our web form here https://t.co/vp44F2Gckn Kind regards, Petra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Katrinespolicy Hi Katrine, I'm very sorry to learn that you're waiting for so long already. Please send me your reference number in a DM so I can check on your case. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra

@VongSoftware (2/2) Leider ist es uns aktuell nicht möglich, aufgrund des enormen Volumen an Nachrichten schneller zu antworten. Wir bitten dich daher abzuwarten, bis dir unsere Kolleg:Innen antworten können. Vielen Dank! Liebe Grüße, Alessandra

@VongSoftware (1/2) Hallo,
nach der langen Wartezeit ist es absolut verständlich, dass du keine weiteren entschuldigenden Antworten von uns lesen möchtest. Wir können allerdings nur immer wieder betonen, dass alle eingetroffenen Anliegen so schnell wie möglich bearbeitet werden.
@toreheliks We appreciate you taking the time to let us know, Tore. We hope the rest of your day gets better! Best regards, Alessandra

@sillylittlecats Hello Cat,
We're very sorry for the bad experience you made. We hope everything worked out well in the end!
Best regards
Alessandra

@thehoboblanket Hello,
I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight cancellation. Kindly note that if you have incurred any expenses during the delay you may apply for compensation via the following link: 
https://t.co/lQ0BbSodym
Best regards
Alessandra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@zyxiiiwvu @staralliance Hi, 
Aufgrund einer technischen Störung ist unsere Service-Hotline nicht erreichbar. Wir arbeiten daran dieses Problem so schnell wie möglich zu lösen.
Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten und bedanken uns für deine Geduld.
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

.@staralliance brought together Kenneth Tindall and Venus Ex Machina to demonstrate the extraordinary power of face-to-face.
#TogetherBetterConnected #StarAllianceFamily https://t.co/I5UdxEZV3E
@chrcit Lieber Christian, schicke uns bitte noch deine E-Mail Adresse, dann können wir deine Nachricht intern weiterleiten. Vielen Dank. Liebe Grüße, Sandra

@lku73 Hi, es tut mir leid, dass der Service am Flughafen Düsseldorf nicht wie gewohnt war. Es freut mich aber, dass unsere Kolleg:innen an Bord diesen Umstand korrigieren konnten. Dein Feedback gebe ich gerne intern weiter. Liebe Grüße, Sandra

@Melissa_Trumbul We're sincerely sorry to hear that, Melissa. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to change your impression of us. We're disappointed that you had such a negative experience 
& we hope to have the opportunity to redeem ourselves on a future flight Best regards, Alessa

@SoloTravelStory Hi Carolin, please send us a private message so I can send you an explanation of how to submit the form as we experience technical issues for a few days now. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra

@loshtwala Hi there, we are sorry that you have not received a reply yet. Unfortunately, our colleagues are currently working through a backlog of claims. They will be in touch as soon as they can. We apologize for the delay and further inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Petra

@StefanGreimel Hi Stefan, hast du dein Anliegen bereits über unser Kontaktformular geschickt? https://t.co/1qOqElGNOf Falls ja, sei bitte versichert, dass unsere KollegInnen dir verlässlich antworten werden. Leider kommt es aktuell zu längeren Bearbeitungszeiten. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @spale75 Hi Pascal, wie genau können wir dir weiterhelfen? Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@marjoriexile Hi Ida, in this case, please fill out our feedback form under the header "confirmation" and include in the message, that you need a reason for the cancellation. Sorry for the inconvenience, kind regards, Petra

@Sobhan85660532 Hi there, if you already sent our online form regarding compensation, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Due to the current situation, the response can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@padmakumaran @Schiphol Hi there, We are sorry to hear about your experience in Amsterdam and do apologize for it. To bring your inquiry to our notice I kindly ask you to fill out our online form by using the following link https://t.co/0sMmStrP0R 
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@marjoriexile [2/2] Please also note: This confirmation can be created retroactively up to 365 days and can be issued for Austrian Airlines-operated flights only.
Best regards, Shawn

@marjoriexile [1/2] Hi there, 
We are sorry to hear that your journey was affected by a cancelation. Please use the following link https://t.co/Do4ZZY5qSP. Under the following link, you will receive the requested confirmation of a flight delay, flight diversion or flight cancellation.

@hi_man_shoe [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@hi_man_shoe [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@ZGelsi [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport.  There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@ZGelsi [1/2] Hi, we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@AyceCelikel @lufthansa @eurowings Hi, as the file reference nr. is a 4Y - Eurowings Discovery file, it would be only possible to retrieve your case at their homepage or tracking site. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @Angelicdanger24 Hi Angelica, we're truly sorry that you've been affected by a cancellation. Please send us your booking code via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@kurvanc Hallo Kurt, es tut uns leid, dass wir dir nicht früher antworten konnten. Die gestrige OS87 mussten wir leider stornieren. Liebe Grüße, Mia

@AyceCelikel @lufthansa @eurowings [2/2]Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received it at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @AdlerProdNYC Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@abdullatif_aydn @EAES_eu @claimcompanies @Flight_Refunds (1/2) Hello Abdullatif,
we apologise for the delay. Upon checking, we see that your claim was well received by our Customer Care team. Due to the high volume of requests they have received in the last few months,

@Ayelet09224775 Hey Ayelet,
simple as that. There are various departments within our company.
Best regards
Alessandra

@duzdanisaq @flughafen_wien @HeathrowAirport Hello again Ismail,
Try deleting your browser caches before you try to access your account again. Hopefully, this'll resolve the issue. Let us know if it doesn't and we'll try to help further.
Best regards
Alessandra

@SoloTravelStory Hallo Carolin,
bitte wende Dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem Property Irregularity Report oder PIR zu finden ist. Den Property Irregularity Report hast Du am Lost&Found Schalter am Flughafen bekommen, und darauf sind alle Informationen vermerkt. 
Liebe Grüße
Alessandra

data.text: @Ayelet09224775 Dear Ayelet, we're sorry you still haven't got an answer yet. Right now we have a lot of inquiries. Unfortunately, we can't tell you a specific time of response. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you asap. Best regards, Christiane

@duzdanisaq @flughafen_wien @HeathrowAirport Hi Ismail, we are very sorry to hear that you had difficulties filling out the contact form. I have gladly forwarded your feedback and the error message to the respective colleagues. Please use a different browser or try it today at a later time again. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @NohaGilani Hi there, we are sorry to hear that your baggage didn´t arrive. If you have already reported the delay of your baggage you can track it via https://t.co/9JrPm4z9gg. We hope you will be reunited with your baggage very soon. Kind regards, Derya

@BillyBog1 Hi Billy, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, as already explained, we- the social media team- do not have access to the baggage system and can therefore only ask you to contact our colleagues via the already mentioned online form. Kind regards, Chris

@Ayelet09224775 Hi Ayelet, we apologize for any frustration caused. Have you sent your request via our form? https://t.co/DlPk2w2pFw If yes, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Due to the enormous amount of requests this can take some time, unfortunately. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @SoloTravelStory Hi Carolin, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Koffer nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte kontakitere unsere KollegInnen über die Nummer auf deinem Missing Luggage Report, da wir, das Social Media Team, leider keinen Zugang zum Gepäckssystem haben. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@Princessmusic00 Hi Leanne, we are sorry to hear that your case has not been solved so far. If you have sent your request via our online form https://t.co/DlPk2w2pFw already our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @AndreasZommer [2/2]  Leider können wir keinen konkret absehbaren Zeitraum verlässlich kommunizieren. Bitte sei versichert, dass unsere KollegInnen ihr Möglichstes tun und alle Anfragen beantwortet werden. Vielen Dank für deine Geduld. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@AndreasZommer [1/2] Hi Andreas, es tut uns leid, dass dein Anliegen noch nicht abgeschlossen werden konnte. Wir bitten um Verständnis, dass die Bearbeitung in der aktuellen Situation nicht in den sonst üblichen Fristen möglich ist.

@dominicwsr Hi Dominic, this error message usually means that your passport and/or visa information has been entered wrongly. Please contact our staff at the check-in desk directly for further assistance. Best regards, Christiane

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @LisaJaneH1209 Hi Lisa, if you call our hotline to get information on your reimbursement they are not able to help you. Only our specialized Feedback Department can give you this kind of information. My colleague already asked you to send your file reference number via DM. Best regards, Sandra

@SoloTravelStory Liebe Carolin,
Falls Du dich über den Gepäckstatus informieren willst, nutze bitte ausschließlich die Online-Gepäckstatus-Abfrage. Unsere telefonischen Service Center können bei Fragen zu Deinem Gepäck nicht weiterhelfen.
https://t.co/WBY0nxE37I
Liebe Grüße, Alessandra

@lucianadrian Hi, this is definitely not the kind of surprise we want our guests to experience. I'm really sorry for that and hope that your future travels with us start as planned. Best regards, Sandra

@jozin_y2k @Ryanair Hello Jozef,
Thank you for your feedback.
Please let us know if we can help out with the check-in procedure.
You can send us your booking code in a DM, we'll try to help.
Best regards, Alessandra

data.text:
Today our youngest fleet member "Donau-Auen" took off on its maiden flight OS461 from @flughafen_wien to @HeathrowAirport! 💂‍♀️🇬🇧

We can't wait to have you on board and make your journey even more comfortable with us! #LovingTheWorld #ServusA320neo 🤗✈️ https://t.co/jY2T8vz3xE

data.text:
@StuivenBerghees Hello Stuiven,
we're very sorry for any inconvenience concerning your request. Thank you for your patience until now. We kindly ask you to give our colleagues more time as they try to accomplish every case individually.
Best regards
Alessandra

@dr_nodabashian Hi Nishan, the information, that this service is only available on selected short and medium-haul flights, can be found directly on our website: https://t.co/GddvFefK3s Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Internet on the plane
urls.description: With Austrian FlyNet you can enjoy the Internet on the aircraft. Read emails or write to friends: Select your data package.

data.text: @dr_nodabashian Hi Nishan, at the moment we are expanding our wireless internet option on our fleet. We are still in the process, so not all aircrafts are equipped. Until then please bear with us. Kind regards, Mia

data.text: @right_protocol Hello Shahzad, kindly send us your booking reference via pm, so we can take a closer look on your booking. Kind regards, Mia

@eklow Hello Eklöw,
I'm sorry to hear. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeIKQj2 Best regards, Alessa
@agdanski Hi Artur! Thanks for sharing this awesome picture! Happy to hear, that you had a great flight! We're looking forward in welcoming you soon on board! Kind regards, Daphne

@TWaldheim Hallo Thomas, es tut uns sehr leid zu hören, dass du von einer Flugstornierung betroffen warst. Wir bemühen uns nach besten Kräften Annullierungen zu vermeiden. Fülle diesbezüglich gerne das Formular auf unserer Website aus: https://t.co/af9Nrai6Xk Liebe Grüße, Petra

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @MarianGrecu @Airbus @MagratheanTimes Hi Marian, the A320neo will be flown by Austrian Airlines on continental services, primarily on routes to London and Berlin, and later on also to Amsterdam and Frankfurt. Kind regards, Daphne

Hello gorgeous! ✈️😍
Today we proudly welcomed our newest fleet member, our first @Airbus #A320neo. Federal Minister @MagratheanTimes & our board christened our new aircraft “Donau-Auen”.
We thank all partners for their participation in today's welcome event! #ServusA320neo https://t.co/NdkyyNWXZT

data.text: @vow5 Hi Yoram, we already replied to your pm! Kind regards, Mia

@lisajaneh1209 Hi Lisa, I'm sorry that you are already waiting for so long. Please send me your file reference number XXXX-OS-XXXXXX via pm so we can have a closer look at your complaint. Kind regards, Mia

@BillyBog1 [3/3] Please be so kind and let us know, if you have received any reference numbers (XXXX-OS-XXXXX), so we can check if your entry was correctly received and lined up. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Best regards, Shawn

@BillyBog1 [2/3]Also, be informed that the amount our colleagues have to process is constantly rising and that is why the general process takes very much longer than expected. We do apologize for that.

@BillyBog1 [1/3] Hi Billy, 
we are sorry to hear that you haven't received any reply yet. Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

@vagelis_h @lufthansa [4/4]With the given reference number, we are going to be able to check your claim for monetary compensation. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:
@arnonimm [2/2]Die Maschine, welches in der Früh die Route VIE-BER-VIE bedient hat, wird in den meisten Fällen nicht genau dieselbe Rotation über den ganzen Tag fliegen. 
Liebe Grüße, Gayle

@arnonimm [1/2]Hallo Arnold, 
vielen Dank für deine Nachricht! Trotz einer Verspätung kann es sein, dass sich die Tagesrotation einer Maschine im Laufe des Tages verbessert und damit die Verspätung aufholt.
@megcaldwell @lufthansa @Mastercard Hi Megan, thank you for contacting us. Did you already file a complaint? Please send us your file reference number in a DM. Best regards, Sandra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @lenniezhu Hi, we apologize for the disruption to your journey and hope you are back safely now.  Runway flooding in HER meant our outbound flights had to be diverted and ultimately return to Vienna. This was why the inbound flights were postponed to today. Kind regards, Lyndsay

users.name: voigimpft, aber unzfrieden mit der Gesamtsituation
